tidbits.title: Atoll Life
tidbits.description: Tokelau consists of three atolls in the South Pacific, known for their pristine beauty, turquoise lagoons, and a way of life deeply connected to the sea.

tidbits.title: Small Population
tidbits.description: With a small population spread across the atolls, Tokelau maintains close-knit communities, preserving its Polynesian culture, language, and traditions.

tidbits.title: Sustainability Efforts
tidbits.description: The islands prioritize sustainability, with initiatives focused on environmental conservation, renewable energy, and traditional fishing practices.
